pr_title: Fix zero-based error line and column numbers printing when compiling

timeline.message: Fix zero-based error line number printing

timeline.bodyText: Is this the best way to handle this? 🤔 My concern here is that the toString() of the Diagnostic impl is duplicated here. How about creating a copy of the whole Diagnostic instance? Maybe add a builder API to Diagnostic to make it easier to create copies of Diagnostic instances?
timeline.author: pubudu91

replies.bodyText: We can go with this for now though, and maybe revisit later.
replies.author: pubudu91

replies.bodyText: IMO, creating new diagnostics kinda going out of its definition, isn't it? Here, We only need to change the position and print right ?
replies.author: dulajdilshan

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, converting the diagnostic to a 1-based position. My concern is this feels like a rather ad hoc solution and duplicates the toString() of the diagnostic implementation. My point was whether we should consider having a proper util/API for converting a given diagnostic to 1-based positions.
But I guess we can go with this for now and revisit this later.
replies.author: pubudu91
